Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: WorkflowInput
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The type of data coming into the FlowRepresentable; defaulted to Never; Nevermeans the FlowRepresentable will ignore data passed in from the Workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: WorkflowOutput
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The type of data passed forward from the FlowRepresentable; defaulted to Never; Never means data will not be passed forward.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: _workflowPointer
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: A pointer to the AnyFlowRepresentable that erases this FlowRepresentable; will automatically be set.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: shouldLoad()
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Returns a Boolean indicating the Workflow should load the FlowRepresentable; defaults to true.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: proceedInWorkflow(_:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Moves forward while passing arguments forward in the Workflow; if at the end, calls the onFinish closure used when launching the workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: proceedInWorkflow()
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Moves forward in the Workflow; if at the end, calls the onFinish closure used when launching the workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: proceedInWorkflow(_:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Moves forward while passing arguments forward in the Workflow; if at the end, calls the onFinish closure used when launching the workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: flowRepresentableName
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: The name of the FlowRepresentable as used in the Workflow Data Scheme

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.name: abandonWorkflow(animated:onFinish:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:12Sw.abstract: Called when the current workflow should be terminated, and the app should return to the point before the workflow was launched.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.name: FlowRepresentable
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.abstract: A component in a Workflow; should be independent of the workflow context.

Classes/Workflow.html.name: Workflow
Classes/Workflow.html.abstract: A doubly linked list of FlowRepresentableMetadatas; used to define a process.

Protocols/PassthroughFlowRepresentable.h.name: PassthroughFlowRepresentable
Protocols/PassthroughFlowRepresentable.h.abstract: A FlowRepresentable that automatically captures data from the Workflow and passes it forward.
